statements: SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM SimulationParameters;
SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters WHERE constant_value > 100;
SELECT constant_name, constant_value FROM SimulationParameters WHERE parameter_value < 50;
SELECT parameter_name, constant_name FROM SimulationParameters ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, constant_name FROM SimulationParameters WHERE parameter_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters ORDER BY constant_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT constant_name FROM SimulationParameters;
SELECT simulation_id, parameter_name, constant_name FROM SimulationParameters WHERE constant_value < 10 ORDER BY parameter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM simulation_parameters
SELECT id, simulation_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE id = 1
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE simulation_name = 'First Simulation'
SELECT * FROM simulation_parameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC
SELECT constant_name, constant_value FROM simulation_constants
SELECT * FROM simulation_parameters WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY simulation_name ASC
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE parameter_value < 0.5 ORDER BY parameter_name DESC
SELECT simulation_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE simulation_name LIKE '%A%' AND parameter_name LIKE '%B%'
SELECT constant_name, constant_value FROM simulation_constants WHERE constant_value BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY constant_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT simulation_name) AS total_simulations FROM simulation_parameters
SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters;
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_description FROM SimulationParameters;
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_date FROM SimulationParameters ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;

SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM SimulationLogs WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Constants WHERE constant_value > 10 ORDER BY constant_name DESC;
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_name FROM SimulationParameters WHERE simulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM SimulationLogs WHERE simulation_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT constant_name, constant_value, constant_unit FROM Constants WHERE constant_unit IN ('kg', 'm');
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_description FROM SimulationParameters WHERE simulation_name LIKE '%test%' ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SimulationParameters ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_description FROM SimulationConstants;
SELECT constant_name, constant_value, constant_unit FROM SimulationConstants WHERE constant_value > 0;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSimulations WHERE simulation_name LIKE '%quantum%';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, researcher_affiliation FROM SimulationResearchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;

SELECT id, simulation_name, simulation_description FROM SimulationParameters WHERE simulation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_results FROM QuantumSimulations WHERE JSON_LENGTH(simulation_results) > 0 AND simulation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM SimulationResearchers WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT constant_name, constant_value, constant_unit FROM SimulationConstants WHERE constant_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY constant_value ASC;

SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM SimulationParameters WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSimulations ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;

SELECT simulation_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM SimulationLogs GROUP BY simulation_id;
